mapper.sql: t.ID, t.CULPRIT_ID, t.ICONID, t.TYPE, t.REMARK, t.MOBILENUMBER, t.CREATED, t.CREATER, t.UPDATED, t.UPDATER, t.DEL_FLAG, t.INTERVAL_TIME
mapper.select:
select , c.name as "culprit_name", g.id as "group_id", g.name as "group_name", tar.area_id as area_id,
case when ta.islive is not null then ta.islive else '掉线' end as "isLive", ta.locationtype as "location_type",c.dic_monitor_grade_key as "dic_monitor_grade_key", case when oa.id is not null then '是' else '否' end as "over"
from SF_TERMINAL t left join sf_terminal_area tar on tar.terminalid = t.id left join sf_culprit c on c.id = t.culprit_id left join sys_group g on g.id = c.group_id left join sf_terminal_activity ta on ta.terminal_Id = t.id left join (select a.id,a.culprit_id, row_number()over( PARTITION BY a.culprit_id ORDER BY a.created desc ) as rnum from sf_over_alarm a )oa on oa.culprit_id = c.id and oa.rnum = 1 where t.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.delete: delete from SF_TERMINAL where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.insert: insert into SF_TERMINAL (ID, CULPRIT_ID,ICONID, TYPE,REMARK,MOBILENUMBER, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG,INTERVAL_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{intervalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into SF_TERMINAL
ID,
CULPRIT_ID,
ICONID,
TYPE,
REMARK,
MOBILENUMBER,
CREATED,
CREATER,
UPDATED,
UPDATER,
DEL_FLAG,
INTERVAL_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mobileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{intervalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update SF_TERMINAL
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICONID #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILENUMBER = #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTERVAL_TIME = #{intervalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG =0
mapper.select:
select , c.name as "culprit_name", g.id as "group_id", g.name as "group_name", tar.area_id as area_id,
case when ta.islive is not null then ta.islive else '掉线' end as "isLive", ta.locationtype as "location_type",c.dic_monitor_grade_key as "dic_monitor_grade_key", case when oa.id is not null then '是' else '否' end as "over"
from SF_TERMINAL t left join sf_terminal_area tar on tar.terminalid = t.id left join sf_culprit c on c.id = t.culprit_id left join sys_group g on g.id = c.group_id left join sf_terminal_activity ta on ta.terminal_Id = t.id left join (select a.id,a.culprit_id, row_number()over( PARTITION BY a.culprit_id ORDER BY a.created desc ) as rnum from sf_over_alarm a )oa on oa.culprit_id = c.id and oa.rnum = 1
order by ${orderStr}

if.test: isLive != null and isLive !='' and isLive !='异常' and isLive !='掉线'

sql.if: AND (ta.ISLIVE = '掉线' or ta.ISLIVE is null)

if.test: locationType != null and locationType !='' and locationType !='手环'

sql.if: AND exists ( select t2.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) t2 where c.group_id=t2.id)
